title: wine_Minimus_2015_Vitae_Springs_Vineyard_Grüner_Veltliner_(Willamette_Valley)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 59037.
country: US.
description: The deep, almost tawny gold color, coupled with a slight pétillance, signals that this is no ordinary GV. It went through four days of whole cluster maceration before being fermented with wild yeasts in new 500-liter Austrian oak puncheons. It's rich, toasty and lively in the mouth, yet smoothed out with the oxidative impact of the time in wood. A generous and flavorful wine, it shows toast and nuts and caramelized highlights along with light apple-butter fruit..
designation: Vitae Springs Vineyard.
points: 91.
price: 30.0.
province: Oregon.
region_1: Willamette Valley.
region_2: Willamette Valley.
taster_name: Paul Gregutt.
taster_twitter_handle: @paulgwine .
title: Minimus 2015 Vitae Springs Vineyard Grüner Veltliner (Willamette Valley).
